frame.name: Activity_finish
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> finishes an <fen>Activity</fen>, which can no longer logically continue. This frame is a subframe of <fen>Activity</fen>. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Agent">Jason</fex> <t>completed</t> <fex name="Activity">grading the papers</fex> <fex name="Time">late Sunday night</fex>.</ex>
<ex>Upon <t>completion</t> <fex name="Activity">of the final exam</fex>, <fex name="Agent">Ava</fex> tossed out her notes. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Depictive</fen> phrase describing an actor or an undergoer of an action. </def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> an <fen>Agent</fen> is engaged in finishing an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Co-timed_event
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the last <fen>Co-timed_event</fen> of the finished <fen>Activity</fen>.<ex>They <t>finished</t> the peace march <fex name="Co-timed_event">with a prayer</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> finishes the <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Activity</fen> finishes.</def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Agent</fen> who has finished an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> has finished.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which an <fen>Agent</fen> finishes an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which an <fen>Agent</fen> finishes for an <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the how near the agent is to finishing. </def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the <fen>Explanation</fen> causes the target's proposition, but not in all cases. </def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants. </def-root>

FE.name: Containing_event
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies an event during which the <fen>Agent</fen> finishes the <fen>Activity</fen>.
</def-root>

lexUnit.name: recapituleren.v
lexUnit.definition: de inhoud van iets opnieuw, kort weergeven, samenvattend herhalen

lexUnit.name: uittrekken.v
lexUnit.definition: door trekken iets ergens uit halen
